text: Guizbangɨra, gumazir vamɨra Godɨn akam batoke, ezɨ an arazir kuramɨn ovevem gumazamiziba bar me gatifa. Ezɨ God uan apangkuvim gumazamiziba avarazɨ a me gizɨfa, ezɨ a ghaze, ia nan damazimɨn dera. Kar a pura anɨngizir bizim. Egh gumazir vamɨra Krais Iesusɨn ingangarimɨn, tina God pura anɨdir bizim iniva, a Krais ko ikɨva bizibagh ativagh dar ganam. Egh me kamagh ikɨva me bizibagh ativaghamin gavgavim, ovevemɨn gavgavim gafiragham.
